thread.title: Jets settle on Josh McCown as their quarterback
thread.title_full: Jets settle on Josh McCown as their quarterback | New York Post

author: Brian Costello
title: Jets settle on Josh McCown as their quarterback
text:
The Jets have landed their new quarterback.
The team agreed to a one-year deal with veteran Josh McCown on Monday, according to his agent , Mike McCartney.
McCown visited the team over the weekend . The terms of the deal were not immediately known. The 37-year-old comes to the Jets after two years with the Browns, where he was 1-10 as the starter.
The Jets had free agent Chase Daniel in for a visit on Monday, but opted to sign McCown.
McCown, who turns 38 on July 4, can serve as a mentor to young Jets quarterbacks Bryce Petty and Christian Hackenberg while competing with them for the starting job.
